title: [Enhancement] Add namespace v2 in client
description:
Before Creating the Enhancement Request

  • I have confirmed that this should be classified as an enhancement rather than a bug/feature.

Summary

  1. Add namespace v2 in client
  2. Add NamespaceRpcHook

Motivation

Currently, our namespace implementation relies on a concatenation-based approach. Contrary to this, we are proposing a new namespace scheme that will be integrated into the protocol through RPC hooks

Describe the Solution You'd Like

Implement namespace in the protocol.

Describe Alternatives You've Considered

No

Additional Context

No response
